body.raw:
tenants:
  name: "test1_tenant"
  tags: ""
  mon_policy: ""
  ctrl_mgmt_policy: ""
  security_domain: ""
  description: ""
  action: "created,modified"

global:
  name: ""
  description: ""
  action: "ignore"

tenant: "test1_tenant"
action: "created,modified"
app:
- name: "test1_app"
  action: "created,modified"
- name: "test2_app"
  action: "created,modified"

global:
  name: ""
  description: ""
  action: "ignore"
  l2_unknown_unicast: "proxy"
  l3_unknown_multicast: "flood"
  multi_dest_flood: "bd-flood"
  arp_flood: "no"
  unicast_routing: "yes"
  subnet_type: "public,shared"
  monitoring_policy: ""
  igmp_snoop: "default"

tenant: test1_tenant
action: "modified"
bridge_domains: 
- name: "test1_bd"
  contex: test1_vrf
  bd_type: "L3"
  bd_gateway_ip: "10.200.1.1/24"
  l3_out: 
  legacy_bd: ""
  e_r_policy: ""
  ep_retention_policy: ""
  action: "created,modified"
- name: "test2_bd"
  contex: test2_vrf
  bd_type: "L3"
  bd_gateway_ip: "10.200.2.1/24"
  l3_out: 
  legacy_bd: ""
  e_r_policy: ""
  ep_retention_policy: ""
  action: "created,modified"

global:
  name: ""
  tenant: ""
  description: ""
  policy_enforcement: "enforced"
  bgp_timers: "default"
  ospf_timers: "default"
  ep_retention: "default"
  monitoring_policy: "default"
  dns_label: "default"
  route_tag_policy: "default"
  action: "ignore"

tenant: test1_tenant
action: "created,modified"
vrfs:
- name: test1_vrf
  action: "created,modified"
- name: test2_vrf
  action: "created,modified"

global:
  name: ""
  description: ""
  action: "ignore"
  phys_domain: ""
  vmm_domain: ""
  custom_qos_policy: ""

tenant: "test1_tenant"
action: "modified"
app:
- name: "test1_app"
  action: "modified"
  epg:
  - name: "test1_epg"
    brigge_domane: "test1_bd"
    phys_domain: "test1_phys_dom"
    description: ""
    action: "created,modified"
  - name: "test2_epg"
    brigge_domane: "test1_bd"
    phys_domain: "test1_phys_dom"
    description: ""
    action: "created,modified"
- name: "test2_app"
  action: "modified"
  epg:
  - name: "test3_epg"
    brigge_domane: "test2_bd"
    phys_domain: "test1_phys_dom"
    description: ""
    action: "created,modified"
  - name: "test4_epg"
    brigge_domane: "test2_bd"
    phys_domain: "test1_phys_dom"
    description: ""
    action: "created,modified"

global:
  name: ""
  description: ""
  action: "ignore"
  mode: "regular"
  pod_id: "1"
  access_port_id: ""


tenant: "test1_tenant"
action: "created,modified"
app:
- name: "test1_app"
  action: "created,modified"
  epg:
  - name: "test1_epg"
    action: "created,modified"
    static_bindings:
    - access_port_id:
      int_pol_group: test1_int_pol_group
      static_binding_type: "PC"
      left_node_id: 1201
      right_node:
      encap_vlan_id: 101
      action: "created,modified"
  - name: "test2_epg"
    action: "created,modified"
    static_bindings:
    - access_port_id: 
      int_pol_group: test2_int_pol_group
      static_binding_type: "vPC"
      left_node_id: 1201
      right_node_id: 1202
      encap_vlan_id: 101
      action: "created,modified"
